<#-- 输出字段列 --> <sql id="${className}Columns"> str_to_date(a.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "createtimestr", str_to_date(a.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "updatetimestr", <#assign columnField> <#list colList as c> a.${c.name} AS "${c.javaFieldId}", </#list> <#list colList as c> <#if c.showType?? && c.showType == "userselect"> <#list c.javaFieldAttrs as a> u${c_index + 1}.${a[1]} AS "${c.simpleJavaField}.${a[0]}", </#list> <#elseif c.showType?? && c.showType == "officeselect"> <#list c.javaFieldAttrs as a> o${c_index + 1}.${a[1]} AS "${c.simpleJavaField}.${a[0]}", </#list> <#elseif c.showType?? && c.showType == "areaselect"> <#list c.javaFieldAttrs as a> a${c_index + 1}.${a[1]} AS "${c.simpleJavaField}.${a[0]}", </#list> </#if> </#list> </#assign> ${columnField?substring(0, columnField?last_index_of(","))} </sql>
